query:
UPDATE apalis.jobs
               SET status = $2,
                   last_error = $3,
                   attempts = COALESCE($4, attempts),
                   run_at = COALESCE($5, run_at),
                   priority = COALESCE($6, priority),
                   done_at = CASE
                       WHEN $2 IN ('Done','Failed','Killed') THEN COALESCE(done_at, now())
                       ELSE NULL
                   END
             WHERE id = $1
